name: Farland
description:
Set off for the unexplored lands of Farland, which hold many secrets and amazing discoveries in this exciting new adventure!

You will meet true friends who left their homes because of a terrible disaster.
In the mysterious lands of Farland, they are trying to find a new home, but without your help, they won't be able to cope...

Helga the Noisy is a good friend, a wonderful hostess and a capable helper, she can always cheer you up and find a way out of any situation.
Halvard the Silverbeard is a wise mentor, always ready to help, share experience and take care of everyone in the village.

In Farland, everyone will find an activity to their liking:

IMPROVE and develop your village and farm!
COLLECT harvests and open new recipes!
DECORATE your village in the way you want!
RAISE animals, get new pets and dress them up in cute outfits!
EXPLORE numerous new lands full of adventure and interesting stories!
MEET new characters and learn their exciting stories!
ENJOY amazing adventures in new lands: reveal secrets, uncover plots, and help your friends!
MAKE decisions on what the wild lands of Farland will look like! Create a thriving farm, a beautiful city and an amazing garden!
CHOOSE where the storyline will go! How to make your farm the most productive, what lands to visit and whom to help.

It's within your power to make this wild land prosperous. Fascinating stories are waiting for you!
